analysis.description:
Broker._withdraw (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1114-1147) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _withdrawer.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1140)
Broker._validateIsContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1391-1395) is declared view but contains assembly code
Broker._getSanitizedReturnValue (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1407-1422) is declared view but contains assembly code

Broker.slowWithdraw (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#617-634) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(announcement.amount == _amount,Invalid amount)

Reentrancy in AtomicBroker.cancelSwap (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1748-1825):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender != address(broker.coordinator()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1778-1782)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- swaps (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1797-1798)

Reentrancy in AtomicBroker.createSwap (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1551-1622):
	External calls:
	- broker.spendFrom(_maker,address(this),_amount,_token,ReasonSwapMakerGive,ReasonSwapHolderReceive) (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1589-1592)
	- broker.spendFrom(_maker,address(this),_feeAmount,_feeAsset,ReasonSwapMakerFeeGive,ReasonSwapHolderFeeReceive) (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1596-1606)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- swaps (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1609-1610)

Broker._validateIsContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1391-1395)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1392-1395

Broker._getSanitizedReturnValue uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1407-1422)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol#1409-1421

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/2/0xeab64b2320a1fc1e65f4c7253385ec18e4b4313b.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.4.25', '^0.4.24']
